meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7154.

td.p: Jennifer Robinson, a manufacturing technician from Windham, Maine
Philip Clark, a high school librarian from Falls Church, Virginia
Dennis Golin, a video editor from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $31,999)

tr.td: HERBS & SPICES
POP CULTURE
LAST NAME'S THE SAME
"K"APITAL CITIES
AMERICAN HISTORY
ANAGRAMS OF EACH OTHER
(Alex: Each correct response will be two words, obviously.)

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The smoked Spanish version of this Hungarian spice is made from pimiento peppers dried & smoked over an oak fire

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
